text: The Last Laff EP is the debut extended play by rapper Lil Rob. == Track listing == # "The Last Laff" (4:08) # "Front, Back, Side to Side" (3:35) # "Naughty Boy" (3:59) # "So Many Styles" (3:54) # "That's When I'll Stop" (4:03) ==References== Category:Lil Rob albums Category:2001 debut EPs
title: The Last Laff EP
